pa.wa. 6.30 ta sil samadan karawima shasthrawedi bambaarande rahula himi, 7.00 buddha puja wandanawa bengamuwe chandarathana himi, 8.00 guwanwiduli dharma deshanawa, 10.30 buddha wandanawa morawaka dhammarathana himi, pa.wa. 1.00 seth pirith sajjhayanawa, 2.00 dharma sakachchawa shasthrawedi wirakatiye sumana himi, 4.00 dharma deshanawa buththala meththananda himi, 7.00 atawisi buddha pujawa rotumbaa somarathana himi.baththaramulla pannipitiya pare siri sudassanarama sadaham senasunedi duruthu poda pawathwena sila bhawana wada satahana meseya.ude 6.00 – 7.00 sila samadanaya aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi. 8.00 – 9.30 bhawanawa aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi.9.30 –10.45 dharma deshanaya – aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi.

anika mama kawadawath kiyawapu de awabodha karagannayi awabodha una tika amaruwen hari pilipadinnayi, gatalu athi than pilibandawa niwaradi karagannayi baluwa misa misak kata padam karanna uthsaha kaleth naha.
kalaya boho gewi athi namuth, ethanin aluth patan ganimak dan wuwath kala haki ya.

"eeka prashnayak hatiyata me kattiya yodagannawa, oya kiyana chodana mama deshapalakayek hatiyata piliganne naha, athithayeth nayakayanta ohoma nikan chodana kala"

2018 janawari palawenida, athigaru janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma dalada maligawa wadapuda gaththeya. 1978 shri lanka janaraja aandukrama wyawasthawe thunwana parichchedaye 10 wana waganithiyata anuwa, oonama pudgalayakuta, thaman kamathi aagamak adahime nidahasa himiya.
